directions: In a large heavy pot, cook onion and apple in oil over medium-high heat until lightly browned.  Stir in cabbage and garlic, then reduce heat.  Stir in potato, broth, Italian seasoning and sugar; cover and simmer 30 minutes.
Stir in cream, salt and pepper.  Heat through and serve.
ingredients: 2 apples - peeled, cored and finely diced
title: Hearty Cabbage Soup
